title: SBI report dismisses bank deposit concerns as a 'Statistical Myth'
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman reviewed Public Sector and Regional Rural Banks. The State Bank of India's latest report countered claims of slowing deposit growth, revealing significant increases in both deposits and credit in FY23 and FY24. The report noted a shift from CASA to term deposits, influenced by higher interest rates.
